solution_line_template: May will be able to make {red_yarns} x {scarves_per_yarn} = <<{red_yarns}*{scarves_per_yarn}={red_scarves}>>{red_scarves} red scarves.
She will be able to make {scarves_per_yarn} x {blue_yarns} = <<{scarves_per_yarn}*{blue_yarns}={blue_scarves}>>{blue_scarves} blue scarves.
And she will be able to make {yellow_yarns} x {scarves_per_yarn} = <<{yellow_yarns}*{scarves_per_yarn}={yellow_scarves}>>{yellow_scarves} yellow scarves.
Therefore the total scarves she can make is {yellow_scarves} + {blue_scarves} + {red_scarves} = <<{yellow_scarves}+{blue_scarves}+{red_scarves}={total_scarves}>>{total_scarves}.
